// src/components/Post.js import React from 'react'; const Post = ({ post }) => { return (
{post.user.username || "User"}
{new Date(post.createdAt).toLocaleTimeString()}

{post.content}

{post.imageUrl && ( )}
{post.likes || 0}
{post.comments || 0}
{/* Comments Section */}
{post.commentsList && post.commentsList.map(comment => (
{comment.user.username || "Commenter"}
{new Date(comment.createdAt).toLocaleTimeString()}

{comment.content}

{comment.likes || 0}
))}
); }; export default Post;
